headline: How GE’s Breakup and Aerospace Focus Will Impact General Electric (GE) Investors
summary: In recent months, General Electric has completed its breakup into three stand‑alone businesses and refocused around GE Aerospace’s high-tech jet engines, services, and propulsion testing collaborations, while investors await its late‑January 2025 fourth‑quarter earnings release. These moves highlight how a more concentrated GE Aerospace, with visible revenue growth, strong free cash flow margins, and advanced propulsion programs, is reshaping the company’s long-term business profile. Next,...

headline: Thai Airways Chooses AAR's Trax & Aerostrat for Digital MRO Upgrade
summary: Thai Airways picks AIR's subsidiaries, Trax and Aerostrat, to drive a digital MRO upgrade with real-time data, AI tools and advanced maintenance planning.

headline: Verallia appoints Cristina Riesgo as CFO
summary: Riesgo has more than two decades of experience in financial roles across various international companies and sectors.
